links.title: Jump on the VM in Turbonomic ARM UI

options.content:
The Host is currently $HOST_STATE.

Name Environment Type Host Name Host Type Host Category
${HOST} ${HOST_ENVIRONMENT} ${HOST_NAME} ${HOST_TYPE} ${HOST_CATEGORY}

targets.rawSql:
select e.name from "scope" s
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e.oid
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'GROUP'
and s.finish >= $__timeTo()
order by e.name

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  "type" as metric,
  utilization as value
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type = 'CPU' or type = 'MEM') AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization as value,
  "type" as metric
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type IN ('CPU_READY','Q1_VCPU','Q2_VCPU','Q4_VCPU','Q8_VCPU','Q16_VCPU','Q32_VCPU','Q64_VCPU')) AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization as value,
  "type" as metric
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type IN ('SWAPPING','BALLOONING')) AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'STORAGE_LATENCY' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'STORAGE_ACCESS' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'IO_THROUGHPUT' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'NET_THROUGHPUT' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "time",
  count(type) as value,
  CONCAT(category,' - ',type) as metric
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' OR category = 'PREVENTION') AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT') AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'COMPLIANCE') AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' OR category = 'PREVENTION') AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  category = 'COMPLIANCE' AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  description AS "Description",
  acceptance_time AS "Acceptance Time",
  recommendation_time as "Recommendation Time",
  final_state as "Final State",
  "type" as "Type",
  category as "Category",
  savings as "Savings"
FROM completed_action
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("acceptance_time") AND
  target_entity_id = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY acceptance_time DESC

list.definition: select name from entity where type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by 1
list.label: Host
list.name: HOST
list.query: select name from entity where type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by 1

list.definition: select oid from entity where name = '$HOST' and type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by last_seen DESC limit 1
list.name: HOST_OID
list.query: select oid from entity where name = '$HOST' and type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by last_seen DESC limit 1

list.definition:
SELECT
CASE environment
WHEN 'ON_PREM' THEN 'On-Premise'
WHEN 'CLOUD' Then 'Cloud'
END
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $HOST_OID
list.name: HOST_ENVIRONMENT
list.query:
SELECT
CASE environment
WHEN 'ON_PREM' THEN 'On-Premise'
WHEN 'CLOUD' Then 'Cloud'
END
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $HOST_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
CASE WHEN int_value::entity_state = 'POWERED_ON' THEN 'Powered On' 
ELSE 'Powered Off'
END
FROM historical_entity_attrs
WHERE entity_oid = $HOST_OID
AND type = 'ENTITY_STATE'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
list.name: HOST_STATE
list.query:
SELECT
CASE WHEN int_value::entity_state = 'POWERED_ON' THEN 'Powered On' 
ELSE 'Powered Off'
END
FROM historical_entity_attrs
WHERE entity_oid = $HOST_OID
AND type = 'ENTITY_STATE'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
